user.title: Connect to YTMDesktop Server
user.description: Enter the connection details for the YTMDesktop Companion Server (defaults are localhost:9863).

auth_check.title: Authorization Required
auth_check.description:
**STEP 1: Check YTMDesktop App**

**Home Assistant is now polling the server.** This should have triggered an approval request in your YTMDesktop application.

**STEP 2: Verify Code**

Verify that the code in the YTMDesktop app matches the code displayed here:

**{code}**

**STEP 3: Confirm Approval**

Once you have approved the request in the YTMDesktop application, check the box below and click SUBMIT.

data.approved: I have approved the code in YTMDesktop

error.connection: Could not connect to the YTMDesktop server or request the authorization code.
error.not_approved: You must check the box to confirm you have approved the code.
error.auth_timeout: The code was not approved in time. Please start over.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred during the configuration process.
error.still_polling: Polling for the permanent token is currently in progress. If you just approved the code, please wait a moment.

abort.auth_timeout: The YTMDesktop application did not approve the token request within the allotted time. Please try again.
